songs.lyrics:

[Hook: Wrekonize]

If you want this thing and
You ain't trippin' that, you bloody (You're a freak)
If you like to put yourself
Where she be muddy, you're a creep

When you're lickin' it (You're a freak)

Never be ordinary, stick the more the merry

Everyone look at you stupid
When you're an F-R-E-A-K

[Hook]

[Verse 3: Rittz]
Fuck, fuck, fuck yeah she is
She brought her heart in her head she gives
She like a dick sucka, yes but a specialist

You come around and the fuckin' is a definite

Now I gotcha, turn the girl out when I hit it
‘Cause she said I get her off more
She ain’t into soft-core
Fuck around the car port
On the backyard floor
Shit to giggles was nothing let me
See how freaky that you are
Pour the liquor on her titty
Lick it off, smoke a cigarette
I bet she gon’ be ready for an encore
Type of freak I applaude for
Even worst when I'm on the pill I
Gave the bitch a dirty sanchez

And I don’t care if there’s hair

Hook on my fishing pole
She got me swimming in the pussy
Like I’m under the olympic gold

songs.title: Freak (Extended mix)
